heading: Unannounced inspections of workplaces by fire department
text:
In addition to any other inspections required by law or
rule, the fire department shall conduct a minimum of fifty unannounced workplace inspections annually to ensure the identific ation
and abatement of any hazardous conditions in violation of section 28-307.1. Such inspections shall include, but not be limited to, sites
where there are known or suspected conditions affecting employee safety and health.
